st:attribute.Name: Ruler
st:attribute.st:role: Shows or hides ruler
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines whether a ruler should be diplayed around the frame.

st:attribute.Name: Drw_settings_GridDisplay
st:attribute.st:role: Display the grid
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines that you will display the grid.

st:attribute.Name: Drw_settings_GridSnapPt
st:attribute.st:role: Snap to point
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Helps you creating points at given locations.

st:attribute.Name: Drw_settings_GridPrimarySpacing
st:attribute.st:role: Main grid spacing in horizontal direction
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the main spacing to be applied to the grid in the horizontal direction.

st:attribute.Name: Drw_settings_GridSecondaryStep
st:attribute.st:role: Number of graduations in horizontal direction
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Applies a given number of graduations to each primary spacing in the horizontal direction.

st:attribute.Name: Drw_settings_AllowDistortions
st:attribute.st:role: Allow distortions in the grid
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Allows different graduations and spacing in the grid.

st:attribute.Name: Drw_settings_GridVPrimarySpacing
st:attribute.st:role: Main grid spacing in vertical direction
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the main spacing to be applied to the grid in the vertical direction.

st:attribute.Name: Drw_settings_GridVSecondaryStep
st:attribute.st:role: Number of graduations in vertical direction
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Applies a given number of graduations to each primary spacing in the vertical direction.

st:attribute.Name: BackgroundColorRed
st:attribute.st:role: Red constituent of sheet background color (for pre-V5R14 drawings)
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the red constituent of sheet background color (for pre-V5R14 drawings).

st:attribute.Name: BackgroundColorGreen
st:attribute.st:role: Green constituent of sheet background color (for pre-V5R14 drawings)
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the green constituent of sheet background color (for pre-V5R14 drawings).

st:attribute.Name: BackgroundColorBlue
st:attribute.st:role: Blue constituent of sheet background color (for pre-V5R14 drawings)
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the blue constituent of sheet background color (for pre-V5R14 drawings).

st:attribute.Name: GraduatedColor
st:attribute.st:role: Graduate sheet background color (for pre-V5R14 drawings)
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines whether the sheet background color is to be graduated (for pre-V5R14 drawings).

st:attribute.Name: BackgroundColorRedDitto
st:attribute.st:role: Red constituent of 2D component sheet background color (for pre-V5R14 drawings)
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the red constituent of background color applied to a detail 2D component sheet (for pre-V5R14 drawings).

st:attribute.Name: BackgroundColorGreenDitto
st:attribute.st:role: Green constituent of 2D component sheet background color (for pre-V5R14 drawings)
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the green constituent of background color applied to a detail 2D component sheet (for pre-V5R14 drawings).

st:attribute.Name: BackgroundColorBlueDitto
st:attribute.st:role: Blue constituent of 2D component sheet background color (for pre-V5R14 drawings)
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the blue constituent of background color applied to a detail 2D component sheet (for pre-V5R14 drawings).

st:attribute.Name: GraduatedColorDitto
st:attribute.st:role: Graduate 2D component sheet background color (for pre-V5R14 drawings)
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines whether the background color is to be graduated for detail 2D component (for pre-V5R14 drawings).

st:attribute.Name: TreeParameters
st:attribute.st:role: Display parameters
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Displays parameters used in the current drawing in the tree.

st:attribute.Name: TreeFormulas
st:attribute.st:role: Displays relations
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Displays relations used in the current drawing in the tree.

st:attribute.Name: DrwFeatUnderView
st:attribute.st:role: Displays features under views
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Displays features under views.

st:attribute.Name: ViewReferential
st:attribute.st:role: Display or hide axis of current view
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Displays or hides the axis of the current view.

st:attribute.Name: ViewRefZoom
st:attribute.st:role: Zoom view axes
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines if the view axes are zoomable like geometry.

st:attribute.Name: ViewAxisSize
st:attribute.st:role: View axis size
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Specifies the reference size used for displaying view axes.

st:attribute.Name: HideWhenStartWkb
st:attribute.st:role: Hide new dialog box when starting workbench
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Hides new dialog box when starting workbench.

st:attribute.Name: DrwPaperLengthUnit
st:attribute.st:role: Paper length unit
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Sets length unit to sheet paper space.

st:attribute.Name: ViewName
st:attribute.st:role: Create "view name" text automatically
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Creates the "view name" text automatically.

st:attribute.Name: ViewScale
st:attribute.st:role: Create "scaling factor" text automatically
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Creates the "scaling factor" text automatically.

st:attribute.Name: ViewFrame
st:attribute.st:role: Display "view extension" frame automatically
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Displays a frame automatically representing the "view extension".

st:attribute.Name: ViewOrientation
st:attribute.st:role: Auxiliary and section views orientation according to profile
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Auxiliary and section views have the same orientation as that of the profile.

st:attribute.Name: GenPropagation
st:attribute.st:role: Reproduce broken and breakout specifications
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Reproduces the broken and breakout specifications.

st:attribute.Name: CATDrwStrictPositioning
st:attribute.st:role: Project view axis system based on 3D axis system
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: The coordinate system of the view projection plane will be defined by projecting the 3D axis system.

st:attribute.Name: BackgroundViewToCopy
st:attribute.st:role: Defines whether the background view will be copied or not into the new sheet
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines whether the background view will be copied or not into the new sheet.

st:attribute.Name: SourceSheetType
st:attribute.st:role: Defines the sheet used as a model to create the new sheet
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the sheet used as a model to create the new sheet.

st:enum.st:role: Uses the first sheet from current drawing
st:enum.st:detailedRole: Uses the first sheet from current drawing.
st:enum.st:role: Browses directories to get sheet from any stored-on-disk drawing
st:enum.st:detailedRole: Browses directories to get sheet from any stored-on-disk drawing.

st:attribute.Name: DrwFrameAndTitleBlockPath
st:attribute.st:role: Path of the directory containing frame and title block styles
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Specifies the path to the directory containing the frame and title block styles.

st:attribute.Name: DrwCalloutSize
st:attribute.st:role: Callout visualization size not dependent on view scale (for pre-V5 R11 drawings)
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: The callout visualization size is not dependent on the view scale (for pre-V5 R11 drawings).

st:attribute.Name: GenAxisCreate
st:attribute.st:role: Generate axis lines
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Generates axis lines.

st:attribute.Name: GenThreadCreate
st:attribute.st:role: Generate threads
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Generate threads.

st:attribute.Name: GenCenterCreate
st:attribute.st:role: Generate center lines
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Generates center lines.

st:attribute.Name: GenHiddenLines
st:attribute.st:role: Generate hidden lines
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Generates hidden lines.

st:attribute.Name: GenFilCreate
st:attribute.st:role: Generate fillet
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Generates fillet.

st:attribute.Name: DrwGenFilConfigure
st:attribute.st:role: Configure fillet generation
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Configures fillet generation.

st:enum.st:detailedRole: Defines whether fillet boundaries are to be displayed on views.
Defines whether symbolic fillets are to be displayed on views.
Defines whether projected original edges are to be displayed on views.
Defines whether original edges are to be displayed on views.

st:attribute.Name: Gen3DColors
st:attribute.st:role: Inherit 3D colors
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Inherits the colors of a part to be automatically generated onto the views.

st:attribute.Name: GenWireFrame
st:attribute.st:role: Projects 3D wireframe
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Visualizes both the wireframe and the geometry on generated views.

st:attribute.Name: GenWireFrameMod
st:attribute.st:role: Configure wireframe projection
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Configures wireframe projection.

st:enum.st:detailedRole: Indicates that projected 3D wireframe can be hidden.
Indicates that projected 3D wireframe is always visible.

st:attribute.Name: DrwProject3DPts
st:attribute.st:role: Project 3D points
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Projects 3D points.

st:attribute.Name: DrwProject3DSymbol
st:attribute.st:role: Project 3D points
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Indicates whether projected 3D points display the symbol inherited from the 3D or the selected symbol.

st:attribute.Name: GenApplyUncut
st:attribute.st:role: Apply 3D specifications
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Apply 3D specifications.

st:attribute.Name: SectionLinetype
st:attribute.st:role: Line type for section view
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Selects line type for section view.

st:attribute.Name: DetailLinetype
st:attribute.st:role: Line type for detail view
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Selects line type for detail view.

st:attribute.Name: BrokenLinetype
st:attribute.st:role: Line type for broken view
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Selects line type for broken view.

st:attribute.Name: BreakoutLinetype
st:attribute.st:role: Line type for breakout view
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Selects line type for breakout view.

st:attribute.Name: SkinLinetype
st:attribute.st:role: Line type for skin view
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Selects line type for skin view.

st:attribute.Name: DrwSectionThickness
st:attribute.st:role: Thickness of section view line
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Selects thickness of section view line.

st:attribute.Name: DrwDetailThickness
st:attribute.st:role: Thickness of detail view line
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Selects thickness of detail view line.

st:attribute.Name: DrwBrokenThickness
st:attribute.st:role: Thickness of broken view line
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Selects thickness of broken view line.

st:attribute.Name: DrwBreakoutThickness
st:attribute.st:role: Thickness of breakout view line
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Selects thickness of breakout view line.

st:attribute.Name: DrwSkinThickness
st:attribute.st:role: Thickness of skin view line
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Selects thickness of skin view line.

st:attribute.Name: DrwGMECreation
st:attribute.st:role: Keep graphical dress-up manually set on geometry
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Keeps graphical dress-up manually set on geometry.

st:attribute.Name: DrwGenerationModeVal
st:attribute.st:role: View generation mode
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines how views will be generated.

st:attribute.Name: CATDrwHRVLOD
st:attribute.st:role: Level of detail
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Specifies the level of detail

st:attribute.Name: DrwExactPreview
st:attribute.st:role: Exact preview for view generation
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Lets you preview the views in design mode even if you are working in visualization mode. Leaving this option unselected uses the visualization data embedded in the 3D document for preview.

st:attribute.Name: DrwGenerationForBox
st:attribute.st:role: Only generate parts larger than specified size
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Only generates parts larger than the specified size.

st:attribute.Name: CATDrwRasterMod
st:attribute.st:role: Raster mode options
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Configures raster views options

st:enum.st:role: Shading with edges, no light source

st:attribute.Name: CATDrwLODVisuMod
st:attribute.st:role: Level of detail used to visualize the drawing
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Level of detail(i.e. the definition, in dpi) that will be used to visualize the drawing

st:attribute.Name: CATDrwLODPrintMod
st:attribute.st:role: Level of detail used to print the drawing
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Level of detail(i.e. the definition, in dpi) that will be used to print the drawing

st:attribute.Name: DrwDefVisuPicture
st:attribute.st:role: Customize visualization of the drawing by setting specified number of dpi(dots per inch)
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Customizes visualization of the drawing by setting specified number of dpi(dots per inch).

st:attribute.Name: DrwDefPrintPicture
st:attribute.st:role: Customize print of the drawing by setting specified number of dpi(dots per inch)
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Customizes print of the drawing by setting specified number of dpi(dots per inch).

st:attribute.Name: DrwGenerationForBoxTol
st:attribute.st:role: Only generate parts larger than specified size
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Only generates parts larger than specified size.

st:attribute.Name: DrwOcclusionCulling
st:attribute.st:role: Enable occlusion culling
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Activates or deactivates occlusion culling. Occlusion culling improves display performance by avoiding redisplay of hidden elements, particularly useful when viewing highly compartmented scenes such as plants and buildings.

st:attribute.Name: CATDrwSelBodyInAss
st:attribute.st:role: Activates or deactivates selection of body in assembly.
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Activates or deactivates selection of body in assembly..

st:attribute.Name: ViewUpdateStatusData
st:attribute.st:role: Defines the product information to be used to determine if a view needs to be updated
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the product information to be used to determine if a view needs to be updated.

st:enum.st:role: Uses the parts visualization data timestamps (cgr data)
st:enum.st:detailedRole: Uses the parts visualization data timestamps (cgr data).
st:enum.st:role: Uses the parts design data timestamps
st:enum.st:detailedRole: Uses the parts design data timestamps.

st:attribute.Name: CATDrwDimClipNoShow
st:attribute.st:role: Put in no show dimension on non-visible geometry
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Put in no show dimension on non-visible geometry and annotations associated in position.

st:attribute.Name: CATDrwGeomOf2DLView
st:attribute.st:role: Generate 2D geometry
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Generates the 2D geometry from Layout views.

st:attribute.Name: DrwSyncUpdate
st:attribute.st:role: Synchronize during update
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Synchronize all the views and sheets in the drawing during update.

st:attribute.Name: CATDrwFTAAnnotLay
st:attribute.st:role: Keeps the layout and dress-up of 2D extracted annotations
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Keeps the layout and dress-up of 2D extracted annotations.

st:attribute.Name: DrwGenerateRedCross
st:attribute.st:role: Generate red cross on annotation
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Annotations which are extracted from 3D are marked with red cross, if their geometry does not get extracted or if their geometry is hidden in the current view.

st:attribute.Name: GenDim
st:attribute.st:role: Generate dimensions when updating the sheet
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Generate dimensions when updating the sheet.

st:attribute.Name: GenDimFilter
st:attribute.st:role: Filters before dimension generation
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Displays the "Dimension generation filters" dialog box before generation.

st:attribute.Name: GenDimAutoPos
st:attribute.st:role: Automatic positioning after dimension generation
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Automatically positions dimensions after generation.

st:attribute.Name: GenDimAutoTrans
st:attribute.st:role: Allow automatic transfer of dimensions between views
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Automatically transfers dimensions to the best view when regenerating.

st:attribute.Name: GenDimAnal
st:attribute.st:role: Analysis after generation
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Displays the "Dimension generation analysis" dialog box after generation.

st:attribute.Name: DrwGenDimFromPart
st:attribute.st:role: Generate dimensions from parts included in assembly views
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Generates dimensions from parts included in assembly views.

st:attribute.Name: GenDimSemiAutoTimeOut
st:attribute.st:role: Delay between dimensions generation for step-by-step mode
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Specifies the delay between each dimension generation when generating dimensions step-by-step.

st:attribute.Name: GenBalloonByInstance
st:attribute.st:role: Creation of a balloon for each instance of a product
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Creates a balloon for each instance of a product.

st:attribute.Name: Drw_settings_CreateCenter
st:attribute.st:role: Create circle and ellipse centers
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Creates circle and ellipse centers when creating circles and ellipses.

st:attribute.Name: Drw_settings_DragElts
st:attribute.st:role: Allow direct geometry manipulation
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Lets you move geometry using the mouse.

st:attribute.Name: Drw_settings_DragModeR14
st:attribute.st:role: Define the solving mode for moving elements
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Lets you define the solving mode for moving elements.

st:enum.st:detailedRole: Moves as many elements as possible and also respect existing constraints.
Moves as few elements as possible and also respect existing constraints.
Moves elements by re-distributing them over the sketch.

st:attribute.Name: Drw_settings_DragWithEndPts
st:attribute.st:role: Drag elements end points included
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Drags elements, including their end points.

st:attribute.Name: Drw_settings_ShowPosition
st:attribute.st:role: Show H and V fields in the "Tools Palette"
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Shows the H and V fields in the "Tools Palette" when creating 2D geometry or when offsetting elements.

st:attribute.Name: DrwEndPtsDuplGenGeom
st:attribute.st:role: Create end points when duplicating generated geometry
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Creates end points when geometry generated from the 3D is duplicated.

st:attribute.Name: CstCreation
st:attribute.st:role: Create detected and feature-based constraints
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Creates both detected and feature-based constraints.

st:attribute.Name: Drw_settings_CpltPosSupport
st:attribute.st:role: Support lines and circles
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Detects lines and circles support.

st:attribute.Name: Drw_settings_CpltPosHorVertTo
st:attribute.st:role: Alignment of two elements
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines that two elements are aligned with each other.

st:attribute.Name: Drw_settings_CpltDirParPerpTan
st:attribute.st:role: Parallelism, perpendicularity and tangency of two elements
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines that two elements are parallel,perpendicular or tangent to each other.

st:attribute.Name: Drw_settings_CpltDirHorVert
st:attribute.st:role: Horizontality and verticality of two elements
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines that two elements are horizontal or vertical to each other.

st:attribute.Name: CstVisu
st:attribute.st:role: Display constraints
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Visualizes the following kinds of constraints.

st:attribute.Name: CstRefSize
st:attribute.st:role: Reference size to display constraints symbols
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the size used as reference to display constraints symbols. Changing it will change the size of all constraints representations.

st:attribute.Name: CstColorR
st:attribute.st:role: Red constituent of color used to display constraints symbols
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the Red constituent of color used to display constraints symbols. Changing it will change the color of all constraints representations.

st:attribute.Name: CstColorG
st:attribute.st:role: Green constituent of color used to display constraints symbols
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the constituent of color used to display constraints symbols. Changing it will change the color of all constraints representations.

st:attribute.Name: CstColorB
st:attribute.st:role: Blue constituent of color used to display constraints symbols
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the Blue constituent of color used to display constraints symbols. Changing it will change the color of all constraints representations.

st:attribute.Name: CstVisuHori
st:attribute.st:role: Display horizontality constraints
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Displays horizontality constraints.

st:attribute.Name: CstVisuVerti
st:attribute.st:role: Display verticality constraints
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Displays verticality constraints.

st:attribute.Name: CstVisuPara
st:attribute.st:role: Display parallelism constraints
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Displays parallelism constraints.

st:attribute.Name: CstVisuPerpen
st:attribute.st:role: Display perpendicularity constraints
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Displays perpendicularity constraints.

st:attribute.Name: CstVisuConcen
st:attribute.st:role: Display concentricity constraints
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Displays concentricity constraints.

st:attribute.Name: CstVisuCoinci
st:attribute.st:role: Display coincidence constraints
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Displays coincidence constraints.

st:attribute.Name: CstVisuTangen
st:attribute.st:role: Display tangency constraints
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Displays tangency constraints.

st:attribute.Name: CstVisuSym
st:attribute.st:role: Display symmetry constraints
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Displays symmetry constraints.

st:attribute.Name: Drw_settings_DiagElts
st:attribute.st:role: Diagnostic visualization
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the visualization of diagnostic on the constrained elements.

st:attribute.Name: Drw_settings_ColorDiagOverDefinedElts
st:attribute.st:role: Over-constrained elements
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the color used for elements in over-constrained models.

st:attribute.Name: Drw_settings_ColorDiagNotConsistentElts
st:attribute.st:role: Inconsistent elements
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the color used for elements in inconsistent models.

st:attribute.Name: Drw_settings_ColorDiagNotChangedElts
st:attribute.st:role: Not-changed elements
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the color used for not-changed elements.

st:attribute.Name: Drw_settings_ColorDiagWellDefinedElts
st:attribute.st:role: Iso-constrained elements
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the color used for elements in iso-constrained models.

st:attribute.Name: Drw_settings_ColorConstructElts
st:attribute.st:role: Construction elements (for pre-V5R11 drawings)
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the color used for construction elements for pre-V5R11 drawings.

st:attribute.Name: Drw_settings_ColorSmartPick
st:attribute.st:role: SmartPick
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the color used for SmartPick elements.

st:attribute.Name: DimSketch
st:attribute.st:role: Dimension following the cursor (CTRL toggles)
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Dimension follows the mouse cursor.Pressing the "CTRL" key lets you temporarily activate or deactivate this mode.

st:attribute.Name: DimLinePosValue
st:attribute.st:role: Default dimension line/geometry distance
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the default distance between dimension line and geometry at creation and/or when moving the geometry.

st:attribute.Name: DimLinePosRelative
st:attribute.st:role: Constant offset between dimension line and geometry
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Lets the dimension line remain at a defined distance from the geometry when the geometry is moving.

st:attribute.Name: DimForce2D
st:attribute.st:role: Associativity on 3D
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Specify how associativity between dimensions and the 3D part or product is handled.

st:enum.st:detailedRole: Only creates dimensions on 3D without associativity.
Creates dimensions on 3D without associativity only if associativity with 3D is impossible.
Never creates dimensions on 3D without associativity.

st:attribute.Name: CATDrwAssocDimOnApproximate
st:attribute.st:role: Allow the creation of associative dimension in approximate views
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: If checked, the dimension associativity rule defined in the "associativity on 3D" section will be applied in approximated views, else the dimensions will be non associative in those views.

st:attribute.Name: DimDrivingAuto
st:attribute.st:role: Create driving dimension
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Creates driving dimension between 2D geometry and 2D or 3D generated geometry.

st:attribute.Name: DimDetectChamfer
st:attribute.st:role: Detect chamfer
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Detects chamfer and creates the appropriate dimension.

st:attribute.Name: DimCircle
st:attribute.st:role: Create dimensions on circle's center or edge
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Creates dimensions on circle's center or edge.

st:enum.st:detailedRole: Creates dimensions on circle's center
Creates dimensions on circle's edge

st:attribute.Name: DimSnapValue
st:attribute.st:role: Configure dimension snapping
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Configures the way dimension snaps its position on the grid or its value between symbols.

st:attribute.Name: DimSnapOnGrid
st:attribute.st:role: Configure dimension snapping
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Configures the way dimension snaps its position on the grid or its value between symbols.

st:attribute.Name: DimSnap
st:attribute.st:role: Snap by default (SHIFT toggles)
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Activates snapping when moving dimensions.Use the "Configure snapping" button to customize the way the dimension snaps. Pressing the "Shift" key lets you temporarily activate or deactivate this mode.

st:attribute.Name: DimMoveSubPart
st:attribute.st:role: Move only selected sub-part
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Allows to move only the selected sub-part of the dimension(dimension line, value, or dimension line secondary).

st:attribute.Name: LineUpBaseOffsetLength
st:attribute.st:role: Default offset to reference for length/distance/angle dimensions
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the default value for the offset to the reference, for length/distance/angle dimensions.

st:attribute.Name: LineUpBaseOffsetAngle
st:attribute.st:role: Default offset to reference for radius/diameter dimensions
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the default value for the offset to the reference, for radius/diameter dimensions.

st:attribute.Name: LineUpOffsetLength
st:attribute.st:role: Default offset between dimensions for length/distance/angle dimensions
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Default value for the offset between dimensions, for length/distance/angle dimensions.

st:attribute.Name: LineUpOffsetAngle
st:attribute.st:role: Default offset between dimensions for radius/diameter dimensions
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the default value for the offset between dimensions, for radius/diameter dimensions.

st:attribute.Name: DrwLineUpStackVal
st:attribute.st:role: Align stacked dimension values
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Aligns all the values of a group of stacked dimensions on the value of the smallest dimension of the group.

st:attribute.Name: DrwLineUpCumulVal
st:attribute.st:role: Align cumulated dimension values
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Aligns all the values of a group of cumulated dimensions on the value of the smallest dimension of the group.

st:attribute.Name: DrwLineUpAutoFunnel
st:attribute.st:role: Automatically add a funnel (For pre-V5R14 cumulated dimensions)
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Automatically adds a funnel whenever the value of the dimension cannot be displayed correctly without it (For pre-V5R14 cumulated dimensions only).

st:attribute.Name: DimDesignMode
st:attribute.st:role: Activate dimension analysis display mode
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Displays the various types of dimensions in different and customizable colors.

st:attribute.Name: DimNotUpToDate
st:attribute.st:role: Dimensions for which are not up-to-date
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the color used in analysis display mode to represent dimensions that are not up-to-date.

st:attribute.Name: DimNotUpToDateR
st:attribute.st:role: Define Red constituent of the color used in analysis display mode to represent dimensions that are not up-to-date
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines Red constituent of the color used in analysis display mode to represent dimensions that are not up-to-date.

st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines Blue constituent of the color used in analysis display mode to represent dimensions that are not up-to-date.

st:attribute.Name: DimNonAssociative

st:attribute.Name: DimNonAssociativeR
st:attribute.st:role: Define Red constituent of the color used in analysis display mode to represent dimensions that are not associated to 3D geometry

st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines Blue constituent of the color used in analysis display mode to represent dimensions that are not associated to 3D geometry.

st:attribute.Name: CATDrwIsolatedDim
st:attribute.st:role: Isolated dimensions
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the color used in analysis display mode to represent dimensions that are not linked to any geometry.

st:attribute.Name: CATDrwIsolatedDimR
st:attribute.st:role: Define Red constituent of the color used in analysis display mode to represent dimensions that are not linked to any geometry
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines Red constituent of the color used in analysis display mode to represent dimensions that are not linked to any geometry.

st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines Blue constituent of the color used in analysis display mode to represent dimensions that are not linked to any geometry.

st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the color used in analysis display mode to represent dimensions converted to graphical elements.

st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines Red constituent of the color used in analysis display mode to represent dimensions converted to graphical elements.

st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines Blue constituent of the color used in analysis display mode to represent dimensions converted to graphical elements.

st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the color used in analysis display mode to represent fake dimensions.

st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines Red constituent of the color used in analysis display mode to represent fake dimensions.

st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines Green constituent of the color used in analysis display mode to represent fake dimensions.

st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines Blue constituent of the color used in analysis display mode to represent fake dimensions.

st:attribute.Name: DimDriving

st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the color used in analysis display mode to represent dimensions that drive 2D geometry.

st:attribute.Name: DimDrivingR

st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines Red constituent of the color used in analysis display mode to represent dimensions that drive 2D geometry.

st:attribute.Name: DimDrivingG

st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines Green constituent of the color used in analysis display mode to represent dimensions that drive 2D geometry.

st:attribute.Name: DimDrivingB

st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines Blue constituent of the color used in analysis display mode to represent dimensions that drive 2D geometry.

st:attribute.Name: Dim3DCst

st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the color used in analysis display mode to represent dimensions generated from 3D constraints.

st:attribute.Name: Dim3DCstR
st:attribute.st:role: Define the Red constituent of color used in analysis display mode to represent dimensions generated from 3D constraints
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the Red constituent of color used in analysis display mode to represent dimensions generated from 3D constraints.

st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines Green constituent of the color used in analysis display mode to represent dimensions generated from 3D constraints.

st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Define Blue constituent of the color used in analysis display mode to represent dimensions generated from 3D constraints.

st:attribute.Name: DrwTechFeatDim

st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the color used in analysis display mode to represent technological feature dimensions.

st:attribute.Name: DrwTechFeatDimR
st:attribute.st:role: Define Red constituent of the color used in analysis display mode to represent technological feature dimensions
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines Red constituent of the color used in analysis display mode to represent technological feature dimensions.

st:attribute.Name: DrwTechFeatDimG

st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines Green constituent of the color used in analysis display mode to represent technological feature dimensions.

st:attribute.Name: DrwTechFeatDimB

st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines Blue constituent of the color used in analysis display mode to represent technological feature dimensions.

st:attribute.Name: DimNotUpToDate3DCst
st:attribute.st:role: Dimension that drive 3D constraint which are not up-to-date
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the color used in analysis display mode to represent dimension that drive 3D constraint which are not up-to-date.

st:attribute.Name: DimNotUpToDate3DCstR
st:attribute.st:role: Define Red constituent of the color used in analysis display mode to represent dimension that drive 3D constraint which are not up-to-date
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines Red constituent of the color used in analysis display mode to represent dimension that drive 3D constraint which are not up-to-date.

st:attribute.st:role: Define Green constituent of the color used in analysis display mode to represent dimension that drive 3D constraint which are not up-to-date
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines Green constituent of the color used in analysis display mode to represent dimension that drive 3D constraint which are not up-to-date.

st:attribute.st:role: Define Blue constituent of the color used in analysis display mode to represent dimension that drive 3D constraint which are not up-to-date
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines Blue constituent of the color used in analysis display mode to represent dimension that drive 3D constraint which are not up-to-date.

st:attribute.Name: DimTrue
st:attribute.st:role: True dimensions
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the color used in analysis display mode to represent true length dimensions.

st:attribute.Name: DimTrueR
st:attribute.st:role: Define Red constituent of the color used in analysis display mode to represent true length dimensions
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines Red constituent of the color used in analysis display mode to represent true length dimensions.

st:attribute.Name: DimTrueG
st:attribute.st:role: Define Green constituent of the color used in analysis display mode to represent true length dimensions
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines Green constituent of the color used in analysis display mode to represent true length dimensions.

st:attribute.Name: DimTrueB
st:attribute.st:role: Define Blue constituent of the color used in analysis display mode to represent true length dimensions
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines Blue constituent of the color used in analysis display mode to represent true length dimensions.

st:attribute.Name: DrwDimOnNonVisGeom
st:attribute.st:role: Dimensions on non-visible geometry
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the color used in analysis display mode to represent dimensions that are attached to geometry which is not visible.

st:attribute.Name: DrwDimOnNonVisGeomR
st:attribute.st:role: Define Red constituent of the color used in analysis display mode to represent dimensions that are attached to geometry which is not visible
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines Red constituent of the color used in analysis display mode to represent dimensions that are attached to geometry which is not visible.

st:attribute.Name: DrwDimOnNonVisGeomG
st:attribute.st:role: Define Green constituent of the color used in analysis display mode to represent dimensions that are attached to geometry which is not visible
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines Green constituent of the color used in analysis display mode to represent dimensions that are attached to geometry which is not visible.

st:attribute.Name: DrwDimOnNonVisGeomB
st:attribute.st:role: Define Blue constituent of the color used in analysis display mode to represent dimensions that are attached to geometry which is not visible
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines Blue constituent of the color used in analysis display mode to represent dimensions that are attached to geometry which is not visible.

st:attribute.Name: CATDrwClippedDim
st:attribute.st:role: Clipped dimensions
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the color used in analysis display mode to represent dimensions that are clipped.

st:attribute.Name: CATDrwClippedDimR
st:attribute.st:role: Define Red constituent of the color used in analysis display mode to represent dimensions that are clipped
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines Red constituent of the color used in analysis display mode to represent dimensions that are clipped.

st:attribute.Name: CATDrwClippedDimG
st:attribute.st:role: Define Green constituent of the color used in analysis display mode to represent dimensions that are clipped
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines Green constituent of the color used in analysis display mode to represent dimensions that are clipped.

st:attribute.Name: CATDrwClippedDimB
st:attribute.st:role: Define blue constituent of the color used in analysis display mode to represent dimensions that are clipped
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines blue constituent of the color used in analysis display mode to represent dimensions that are clipped.

st:attribute.Name: ManipRefSize
st:attribute.st:role: Reference size for displaying manipulators
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the reference size used for displaying manipulators.

st:attribute.Name: ManipZoom
st:attribute.st:role: Manipulators zoomable or not
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines if manipulators are zoomable like geometry.

st:attribute.Name: RotSnapAngle
st:attribute.st:role: Rotation snap angle
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the snapping value used when rotating an element using the Select-Rotate command.

st:attribute.Name: RotSnapAuto
st:attribute.st:role: Automatic snapping when rotating
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Snapping automatically when rotating an element.

st:attribute.Name: ORunCre
st:attribute.st:role: Display modify overrun manipulators during creation
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Modify overrun manipulators let you modify interactively the overrun of each extension line during creation.

st:attribute.Name: ORunMod
st:attribute.st:role: Display modify overrun manipulators during modification
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Modify overrun manipulators let you modify interactively the overrun of each extension line during modification.

st:attribute.Name: BlankingCre
st:attribute.st:role: Display modify blanking manipulators during creation
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Modify blanking manipulators let you modify interactively the blanking of each extension line during creation.

st:attribute.Name: BlankingMod
st:attribute.st:role: Display modify blanking manipulators during modification
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Modify blanking manipulators let you modify interactively the blanking of each extension line during modification.

st:attribute.Name: BeforeCre
st:attribute.st:role: Display insert text before manipulators during creation
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Insert text before manipulator lets you easily insert a text before a dimension main value during creation.

st:attribute.Name: BeforeMod
st:attribute.st:role: Display insert text before manipulators during modification
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Insert text before manipulator lets you easily insert a text before a dimension main value during modification.

st:attribute.Name: AfterCre
st:attribute.st:role: Display insert text after manipulators during creation
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Insert text after manipulator lets you easily insert a text after a dimension main value during creation.

st:attribute.Name: AfterMod
st:attribute.st:role: Display insert text after manipulators during modification
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Insert text after manipulator lets you easily insert a text after a dimension main value during modification.

st:attribute.Name: MoveValueCre
st:attribute.st:role: Display move value manipulators during creation
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Move value manipulator lets you easily move the dimension value (and only this value) during creation.

st:attribute.Name: MoveValueMod
st:attribute.st:role: Display move value manipulators during modification
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Move value manipulator lets you easily move the dimension value (and only this value) during modification.

st:attribute.Name: MoveDimLineCre
st:attribute.st:role: Display move dimension line manipulators during creation
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Move dimension line manipulator lets you easily move the dimension line (and only this line) during creation.

st:attribute.Name: MoveDimLineMod
st:attribute.st:role: Display move dimension line manipulators during modification
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Move dimension line manipulator lets you easily move the dimension line (and only this line) during modification.

st:attribute.Name: Move2dPartCre
st:attribute.st:role: Display move dimension line secondary part manipulators during creation
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Move dimension line secondary part manipulator lets you easily move the secondary part of a dimension line (and only this part) during creation.

st:attribute.Name: Move2dPartMod
st:attribute.st:role: Display move dimension line secondary part manipulators during modification
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Move dimension line secondary part manipulator lets you easily move the secondary part of a dimension line (and only this part) during modification.

st:attribute.Name: MoveLeaderCre
st:attribute.st:role: Display move dimension leader manipulators during creation
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Move dimension leader manipulator lets you easily move the leader (and only this part) during creation.

st:attribute.Name: MoveLeaderMod
st:attribute.st:role: Display move dimension leader manipulators during modification
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Move dimension leader manipulator lets you easily move the leader (and only this part) during modification.

st:attribute.Name: ManipTranslationAnnotCre
st:attribute.st:role: Display stretch text manipulators during selection
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Stretch text manipulator lets you lets you stretch the text of the annotation during selection.

st:attribute.Name: ManipTranslationAnnotMod
st:attribute.st:role: Display stretch text manipulators during modification
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Stretch text manipulator lets you stretch the text of the annotation during modification.

st:attribute.Name: ManipResizeAnnotCre
st:attribute.st:role: Display resize text manipulators during selection
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Resize text manipulator lets you resize the annotation during selection.

st:attribute.Name: ManipResizeAnnotMod
st:attribute.st:role: Display resize text manipulators during modification
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Resize text manipulator lets you resize the annotation during modification.

st:attribute.Name: ManipMoveValueAnnotCre
st:attribute.st:role: Display slide text manipulators during selection
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Slide text manipulator lets you slide the text (only the text and not its leaders) during selection.

st:attribute.Name: ManipMoveValueAnnotMod
st:attribute.st:role: Display slide text manipulators during modification
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Slide text manipulator lets you slide the text (only the text and not its leaders) during modification.

st:attribute.Name: ManipTranslationLeaderCre
st:attribute.st:role: Display resize leader attachment manipulators during selection
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Resize leader attachment manipulator lets you resize the leader attachment (and only the attachment) during selection.

st:attribute.Name: ManipTranslationLeaderMod
st:attribute.st:role: Display resize leader attachment text manipulators during modification
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Resize leader attachment manipulator lets you resize the leader attachment (and only the attachment) during modification.

st:attribute.Name: ManipMoveLeaderAnchorCre
st:attribute.st:role: Display move leader anchor point manipulators during selection
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Move leader anchor point manipulator lets you move the anchor point of the leader (and only the anchor point) during selection.

st:attribute.Name: ManipMoveLeaderAnchorMod
st:attribute.st:role: Display move leader anchor point manipulators during modification
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Move leader anchor point manipulator lets you move the anchor point of the leader (and only the anchor point) during modification.

st:attribute.Name: ManipMoveLeaderCre
st:attribute.st:role: Display move leader manipulators during selection
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Move leader manipulator lets you move the leader extremity (and only the extremity) during selection.

st:attribute.Name: ManipMoveLeaderMod
st:attribute.st:role: Display move leader manipulators during modification
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Move leader manipulator lets you move the leader extremity (and only the extremity) during modification.

st:attribute.Name: DrwTextSnappingOn
st:attribute.st:role: Create orientation link between the text and the reference
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Activate the orientation link when a reference is provided during text creation. This option can be inverted by pressing shift key during reference selection. Notice that this option requires the snapping to be on, with a snapping mode that includes orientation snapping.

st:attribute.Name: DrwTextLeadSnappingOn
st:attribute.st:role: When creating a text, it makes the leader perpendicular to the reference
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: When creating a text, it makes the leader perpendicular to the reference.

st:attribute.Name: DrwGDTSnappingOn
st:attribute.st:role: Geometrical tolerance leader extremity normal to reference
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Creates the extremity of geometrical tolerance leaders normal to a reference direction.

st:attribute.Name: DrwTextRigidPosLink
st:attribute.st:role: Text
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: If checked positional link of the text annotation body are created rigid by default. Notice that positional links of leaders are not impacted by this setting.

st:attribute.Name: DrwTableRigidPosLink
st:attribute.st:role: Table
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: If checked every positional link of the table annotation body are created rigid by default. Notice that positional links of leaders are not impacted by this setting.

st:attribute.Name: DrwGDTRigidPosLink
st:attribute.st:role: Geometrical tolerance
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: If checked every positional link of the geometrical tolerances annotation body are created rigid by default. Notice that positional links of leaders are not impacted by this setting. This is especially useful for GDT created on a dimension text.

st:attribute.Name: DrwAnnotSnapMod
st:attribute.st:role: Configure snapping
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Specifies whether annotations should be snapped on the grid, according to the orientation, or both.

st:enum.st:detailedRole: Snaps the position of the annotation on the grid.
Snaps the orientation according to reference.
Cumulates the orientation snapping on the reference and the position snapping on the grid.

st:attribute.Name: DrwAnnotActivSnap
st:attribute.st:role: Snap by default (SHIFT toggles)
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Activates snapping when moving annotations.Click "Configure snapping" to specify whether annotations should be snapped on the grid, according to the orientation, or both.Press the "SHIFT" key to activate/deactivate this option temporarily.

st:attribute.Name: DrwDittoInvViewScale
st:attribute.st:role: Create 2D component with a constant size
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Applies a scale to the 2D component instance, at creation, so as to compensate the view scale.

st:attribute.Name: CATDrwPreventDittoDrag
st:attribute.st:role: Prevents you move 2D components using the mouse
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Prevents you move 2D components using the mouse.

st:attribute.Name: CATDrwPreventDittoScale
st:attribute.st:role: Prevents you scale 2D components using the mouse
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Prevents you scale 2D components using the mouse.

st:attribute.Name: DrwBalloonAssoc
st:attribute.st:role: Uses a parameter defined in 3D to create balloons
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Uses a parameter defined in 3D to create balloons.

st:attribute.Name: DrwBalloonAssocMod
st:attribute.st:role: Uses a parameter defined in 3D to create balloons
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Uses a parameter defined in 3D to create balloons.

st:enum.st:detailedRole: Numbering.
Instance Name.
Part Number.

st:attribute.Name: CATDrwResizeTableEdition
st:attribute.st:role: Recompute table when editing cell
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Recomputes the table when editing a cell.

st:attribute.Name: CATDrwTableAutoSplit
st:attribute.st:role: Split table on several sheets
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: The split is only performed on bill of material, reports and table from CSV file.

st:attribute.Name: CATDrwAFAskForDelSupport
st:attribute.st:role: Ask for deletion of geometry support
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Asks for deletion of geometry support.

st:attribute.Name: CATDrwAFOptimizationMode
st:attribute.st:role: Area Fill detection optimized for geometry
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Defines the tolerance mode allowed when creating an area fill profile.

st:enum.st:detailedRole: Select this option when creating area fills mainly on generated or sketched geometries.
Select this option when creating area fills mainly on views imported from external formats.

st:attribute.Name: DrwOnlyFileNewFrom
st:attribute.st:role: Allows you to create drawings only with the File/New From... command
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Allows you to create drawings only with the File/New From... command.

st:attribute.Name: DrwLockSwitchStandard
st:attribute.st:role: Prevent switch of standard
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Prevents you from switching standards.

st:attribute.Name: DrwLockUpdateStandard
st:attribute.st:role: Prevent update of standard
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Prevents you from updating standards.

st:attribute.Name: DrwLockBackgroundView
st:attribute.st:role: Prevent background view access
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Prevents you from accessing the background view.

st:attribute.Name: PreventViewGeomUpgrade
st:attribute.st:role: Prevent view geometry upgrade
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Prevents you from upgrading the geometry of a view.

st:attribute.Name: DrwStyleCreation
st:attribute.st:role: Use style values to create new objects
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Use style values to create new objects.

st:attribute.Name: CATDrwSheetFromStyle
st:attribute.st:role: Create a new sheet from the style defined in xml file
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Create a new sheet from the style defined in xml file.

st:enum.st:role: Create a new sheet from the xml file
st:enum.st:detailedRole: Create a new sheet from the xml file..
st:enum.st:role: Create a new sheet from the first one
st:enum.st:detailedRole: Create a new sheet from the first one.

st:attribute.Name: DrwOnlyUserDefault
st:attribute.st:role: Only lets you create elements with User Default Properties
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Only lets you create elements with User Default Properties.

st:attribute.Name: DrwAllowUserDefault
st:attribute.st:role: Prevents you from creating and resetting User Default Properties
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Prevents you from creating and resetting User Default Properties.

st:attribute.Name: DrwButtonReset
st:attribute.st:role: Display reset button in dialog boxes
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Displays the reset button in the dialog boxes which support this feature.

st:attribute.Name: DrwPreventGVS
st:attribute.st:role: Prevent generative view style usage
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Prevent generative view style usage.

st:attribute.Name: DrwLockDimDriving3D
st:attribute.st:role: Prevent dimensions from driving 3D constraints
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Prevents you from driving 3D constraints via dimensions.

st:attribute.Name: PreventTrueDimension
st:attribute.st:role: Prevent true dimension creation in non-isometric views
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Prevents you from creating true dimension on non-isometric views.

st:attribute.Name: ImportCenterEndPoints
st:attribute.st:role: Create centers and end points
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Creates circles centers and curves end points when importing 2D geometry.

st:attribute.Name: ConvertDimensionAsGraphic
st:attribute.st:role: Convert dimension as a graphic
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Allows you to convert dimensions as a simple graphic element.

st:attribute.Name: ConvertBalloonAsGraphic
st:attribute.st:role: Convert balloon as a graphic
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Allows you to convert balloons as a simple graphic element.

st:attribute.Name: ConvertOtherAnnotAsGraphic
st:attribute.st:role: Convert other annotation as a graphic
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Allows you to convert texts,GDT,datum,roughness as a simple graphic element.

st:attribute.Name: ExplodeDitto
st:attribute.st:role: Explode ditto when migrating to V5 elements
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Explodes ditto when migrating to V5 elements.

st:attribute.Name: DrwExplodeSymbolo
st:attribute.st:role: Explode symbol when migrating to V5 elements
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Explodes symbol when migrating to V5 elements.

st:attribute.Name: DrwBlinkRed
st:attribute.st:role: Migrate blink element as red color
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Migrates blink element as red color.

st:attribute.Name: DrwGVSXmlV4V5
st:attribute.st:role: Default generative view style
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Selects the default xml file for migration of the view.

st:attribute.Name: DrwAllDetailOneSheet
st:attribute.st:role: Migrate details and symbols in one detail sheet
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Migrates details and symbols in one sheet of detail.

st:attribute.Name: V4V5_LimitThickBold
st:attribute.st:role: Limit V4 thickness for bold attribute
st:attribute.st:detailedRole: Beyond this V4 thickness the migration will apply a bold attribute on the annotation.
